bannerText: We design and implement digital-first solutions that enable millions of students and educators to access quality learning resources, streamline administration, and build measurable impact at scale.
statsText: Despite progress, India’s school system still struggles with learning outcomes, access to digital infrastructure, and fragmented administrative processes. Without robust technology, reforms remain difficult to execute at scale.

stats.text: 24 crore+ students impacted through national programs.
1.6 lakh schools digitized with learning and management solutions.
80 lakh+ teachers supported with training, curriculum, and data-driven insights.

projects.title: National Curriculum Framework(NCF)
projects.description: A unified digital system enabling schools and states to adopt the new curriculum seamlessly, ensuring consistency in pedagogy and assessment.

projects.title: Student Information Management System (SIMS)
projects.description: A robust platform for tracking student records, attendance, performance, and transfers across states.

projects.title: National Achievement Survey (NAS)
projects.description: Conducted at scale to evaluate learning outcomes and provide actionable insights to policymakers and educators.

projects.title: Digital Monitoring Platform
projects.description: A centralized dashboard that enables real-time monitoring of schools, teachers, and learning outcomes.

services.title: Public Digital Platforms
services.description: Building large-scale platforms for education access, monitoring, and governance.

services.title: Digital Content & Assessment Tools
services.description: Interactive content, testing solutions, and learning management systems.

services.title: School Data & MIS Platforms
services.description: Consolidated systems to track, analyze, and improve performance metrics.

services.title: Strategic Consulting & Policy Enablement
services.description: Supporting government and institutions in shaping digital transformation roadmaps.
